entities: The Committee established pursuant to resolution 751 (1992)
reporting_cycle: The Monitoring Group to provide a midterm briefing within six months and submit progress reports to the Committee on a monthly basis
summary:
7. Requests the Secretary-General to make necessary financial arrangements to support the Monitoring Group.

8. Requests the Committee to consider the Monitoring Group's recommendations and suggest ways to improve implementation of and compliance with Somalia and Eritrea arms embargoes and targeted measures.

9. Exempts, for 12 months, humanitarian assistance programmes in Somalia from obligations in paragraph 3 of resolution 1844 (2008).

10. Urges all parties, States, and organizations to cooperate with the Monitoring Group, ensure its members' safety, and provide unhindered access.

11. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
